snippet: Among the artists to appear at the annual series of concerts were Rihanna, Elton John, Metallica, Red Hot Chili Peppers and Shakira.
lead_paragraph: Among the artists to appear at the annual series of concerts were Rihanna, Elton John, Metallica, Red Hot Chili Peppers and Shakira.

headline.main: Rock in Rio Music Festival Ends
